content:
Hi,

one thing I do not understand in full are guests, members and full members. Can a guest (who has been invited) become a member or are the two mutually exclusive?
@Wurzelmann You can change user role in https://chat.zulip.org/#organization/user-list-admin or <Your_Organization>/#organization/user-list-admin
@Aman Agrawal thanks, I'm aware of that, I just have trouble understanding the difference between members and guests tbh
@Wurzelmann https://zulipchat.com/help/roles-and-permissions has the required info.

Aman Agrawal said:

Wurzelmann https://zulipchat.com/help/roles-and-permissions has the required info.

Thanks, I of course read that, before opening this new topic, but my main question remains: can guests become members at any point or are they guests forever?
Then can, if the admin/owner make them member in org settings.
